title: Prethinker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Brain Storm- (Night) Target a player and choose any Town Investigative ability. You will use that ability on that player.
Buzz Word- (Night) Target a player. They will appear as a role of your choice to investigations tonight.
Castling!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a player. If you are attacked tonight, all attacks against you will be redirected to that player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Brain Storm may not use any ability that would have an attack as a consequence.
-Players redirected by Castling! Will not be informed that they were redirected.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Pave the way for a C.O.G.S takeover of the Town! (Normal REF goal)

desc:
Post 4007
*I thought about this long before you showed your face!*
